dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT location_name FROM location WHERE location_gid = :P_WAREHOUSE_GID
SELECT COUNT(*) Total_out FROM glogowner.xxscou_release_sht_9_tbl WHERE inbound_outbound = 'OUTBOUND' AND location_gid = :P_WAREHOUSE_GID
SELECT COUNT(*) Total_in FROM glogowner.xxscou_release_sht_9_tbl WHERE inbound_outbound = 'INBOUND' AND location_gid = :P_WAREHOUSE_GID
SELECT remark_text FROM location_remark WHERE location_gid = :P_WAREHOUSE_GID

SELECT NMC, TO_CHAR(start_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') start_date, start_date_ch, shipment, shipment_ch, (SELECT DISTINCT orr.order_release_xid FROM shipment sh, shipment_stop_d ssd, s_ship_unit ssu, s_ship_unit_line ssul, order_release orr WHERE 1 = 1 AND sh.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid AND orr.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid AND sh.shipment_gid = glogowner.xxscou_release_sht_9_tbl.shipment_gid AND ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = glogowner.xxscou_release_sht_9_tbl.attribute1) ordrel, mode1, mode_ch, carrier, carrier_ch, customer, customer_ch, address, address_ch, po, po_ch, product, product_ch, (CASE WHEN attribute2 = 'Call Scoular' THEN attribute2 ELSE TO_CHAR(quantity,'999,999,990') END) quantity, quantity_ch, (CASE WHEN attribute2 = 'Call Scoular' THEN attribute2 ELSE uom END) uom, uom_ch, (CASE WHEN attribute2 = 'Call Scoular' THEN attribute2 ELSE packaging_num END) packaging_num, packaging_num_ch, (CASE WHEN attribute2 = 'Call Scoular' THEN attribute2 ELSE packaging_uom END) packaging_uom, packaging_uom_ch, (CASE WHEN attribute2 = 'Call Scoular' THEN attribute2 ELSE packaging_ltl END) packaging_ltl, packaging_ltl_ch, (CASE WHEN (SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = glogowner.xxscou_release_sht_9_tbl.attribute1 AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.BAG COUNT') IS NULL THEN glogowner.XXSCOU_SHIP_CONFIRM_PKG.xxscou_get_rel_bags_fcn(glogowner.xxscou_release_sht_9_tbl.shipment_gid) ELSE (SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = glogowner.xxscou_release_sht_9_tbl.attribute1 AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.BAG COUNT') END) bag_count, fda_hold, fda_hold_ch, TRIM(notes || ' ' || (SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = glogowner.xxscou_release_sht_9_tbl.attribute1 AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOT NUMBER' )) notes, notes_ch, inbound_outbound outbound FROM glogowner.xxscou_release_sht_9_tbl WHERE inbound_outbound = 'OUTBOUND' AND location_gid = :P_WAREHOUSE_GID ORDER BY TO_DATE(start_date,'mm-dd-yy')

SELECT NMC, TO_CHAR(start_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') start_date, start_date_ch, shipment, shipment_ch, (SELECT DISTINCT orr.order_release_xid FROM shipment sh, shipment_stop_d ssd, s_ship_unit ssu, s_ship_unit_line ssul, order_release orr WHERE 1 = 1 AND sh.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid AND orr.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid AND sh.shipment_gid = glogowner.xxscou_release_sht_9_tbl.shipment_gid AND ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = glogowner.xxscou_release_sht_9_tbl.attribute1) ordrel, mode1, mode_ch, carrier, carrier_ch, customer, customer_ch, address, address_ch, po, po_ch, product, product_ch, (CASE WHEN attribute2 = 'Call Scoular' THEN attribute2 ELSE TO_CHAR(quantity,'999,999,990') END) quantity, quantity_ch, (CASE WHEN attribute2 = 'Call Scoular' THEN attribute2 ELSE uom END) uom, uom_ch, (CASE WHEN attribute2 = 'Call Scoular' THEN attribute2 ELSE packaging_num END) packaging_num, packaging_num_ch, (CASE WHEN attribute2 = 'Call Scoular' THEN attribute2 ELSE packaging_uom END) packaging_uom, packaging_uom_ch, (CASE WHEN attribute2 = 'Call Scoular' THEN attribute2 ELSE packaging_ltl END) packaging_ltl, packaging_ltl_ch, (CASE WHEN packaging_num = 0 THEN 'Call Scoular' ELSE (CASE WHEN packaging_uom = 'LB' AND uom = 'LB' THEN TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(quantity / packaging_num,0),'999,999,990')) WHEN packaging_uom = 'LB' AND uom = 'KG' THEN TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND((quantity * 2.20462) / packaging_num,0),'999,999,990')) WHEN packaging_uom = 'KG' AND uom = 'LB' THEN TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND((quantity / 2.20462) / packaging_num,0),'999,999,990')) WHEN packaging_uom = 'KG' AND uom = 'KG' THEN TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(quantity / packaging_num,0),'999,999,990')) END) END) bag_count, notes, notes_ch, fda_hold, fda_hold_ch, lot_number, lot_number_ch, inbound_outbound inbound FROM glogowner.xxscou_release_sht_9_tbl WHERE inbound_outbound = 'INBOUND' AND location_gid = :P_WAREHOUSE_GID ORDER BY TO_DATE(start_date,'mm-dd-yy')
select trim(to_char(sysdate,'FMDay, Month DD, yyyy hh:mi AM')) CURR_DATE from dual
